net.atf4j.core.timers

Class Interval

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.atf4j.core.timers.Interval
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntervalInterface

    public class Interval
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntervalInterface
    Encapsulate an Interval of Time in a [GOF] Memento.
